title: texgeek
author: texgeek
content: hey guys, i got low hash result with hiveOS setup with my giga5700x, I already tried a lot of presets, and noOne get +-50mhs,Anyone have a good preset ?

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: Hey, I had a 5700xt from Gigabyte, it was an excelent GPU, with 55MhsTry these settings:Core clock = 1300 MHzMemory Clock = 925 MHz to be safe, or 950 if your card can do the maximumCore Voltage = 820 mVmvdd = 1300 mVvddci = 800 mVMaybe turn off the power limit of 80w, I think this is the most problematic here, your card needs more power to run

comments.author: sxemini
comments.body: Quote from: texgeek on June 19, 2022, 06:55:58 PMhey guys, i got low hash result with hiveOS setup with my giga5700x, I already tried a lot of presets, and noOne get +-50mhs,Anyone have a good preset ?lol did you set the PL to 80w? As I said every time - no one needs a power limit - there is no benefit in setting the PL, only trouble. All you need is fixed clocks and fixed voltage - nothing more - no DPM, no PL !!!!!!Your 6700xt use very much power - normal is under 80w in hiveos = 120w in real. You have 123w in hiveos, so you have around 160w in real from the wall.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: https://hiveon.com/forum/t/rx-5700-xt-58-4mh-s-95w/18220Try these settings, Remove power limit and DPMLook at the settings for 6700 xr and other AMD video cardshttps://hiveon.com/forum/t/6700-xt-overclock-settings-for-hive-os/34040/5
